channel.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][u][b]The storm server[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center]Okay....i've generally been coding several servers and havent even found a good base server... I have also been creating these servers on my own! So...I thought it'd be a good idea if I could use Your ideas!
So...I want to setup a Development Team of GOOD coders... I myself am not a very good coder...but have lots of ideas and I'm quite good when it comes to understanding tutorials and I learn quick!
at the moment I Do not have a forum ( an smf one ) because I want a forum about our game ( [b]The game we will creat together as a team[/b] )
All staff...WILL get a server...Admin or Mod depending on how they helped but remember even the people who post ideas that are taken in will have credits delivered to them!
I have not made anything because i wish to create it from scratch and again with your ideas! but here are a few of my ideas:[/center]
[red: still not done] [orange: not sure] [Green: finished]
[center]( I have found an enclosed space to use the base...but for reasons of leeching I will not give co-ords until I can trust you! I am very sorry...)
Specials and attack made properly... ( if you know of frugooscape you will now what i mean)[/center]
[center]Mod or admin area...You will choose your luxuries?
Dueling... Real wilderness?
all rares must be worked for!? (debatable)[/center]
[b]I would also like to maybe create a client![/b] [b] ideas for client:[/b]
[center]New items... item recolours...proffessional ones a background ( storm server ) cool sprites[/center]
If you would like to apply for any post such as :
server coder... Client coder... client item recolourer... New object maker... etc...
or if you Just have a great idea and want us to put it in!
just fill in this form: ( do not worry if you are young...) [code] Current skill: The best thing you have coded and proof? : Position/Idea: age: msn:
[/code] :D
Please Post!!
[size=20pt] Please do not flame...or spam... i have not done anything wrong and am just trying to create a brilliant game with your help![/size]
[size=10pt]Here is my msn: thomas.nairn@hotmail.com[/size] feel free to ask questions on it as of now!

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!

sure… thankyou :rolleyes:

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!

Well I’m already in a development I was just posting to get a grasp of what you trying to achieve.

Read full topic

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
item.dc:creator: @hot_server hot server
item.description:
@hot_server wrote:

no its not like that
i can creat a server that is fine on its own…just not anything special…
thats y i want you’re help to make it that little better! :o

Read full topic

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

You want people to code it for you then?

Read full topic

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
item.dc:creator: @hot_server hot server
item.description:
@hot_server wrote:

THATS EXACTLY MY POINT RIGHT THERE

I need people who know what they’re doing
any suggestions?

… lol whould i say thankyou or not?

Read full topic

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

= Fail Doesnt Cover Testscape…

&&
And Also, You Yourself Have Admitted Your Not A Good Coder And You Pick Up Tutorials Well. If Your Starting A Dev Team Your Not Going To Be Getting Tutorials, You Need To Be Able To Code Yourself To Make The Server Unique. Just Following Tutorials Isnt Original//Unique In Any Way.
BUT

Good Luck With The Whole Thing…

Read full topic

item.title: New server~Development Team~Your ideas~Your game!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Start with a different server. Testscape = /fail.

Read full topic
